## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G50860](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G50860)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AP-3 alpha, AP3&</u>
- **Gene Name:** Adaptor protein 3 alpha, 
- **Description:**   Clathrin adaptor complex small chain family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2077922
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
